name: Anarchy Jack
description:
Take the role of ANARCHY JACK, the youngest member in a line of martial artists as he tries to stop his brother from running an illegal underground fighting tournament known as THE KUMITE. Take on FOUR DIFFERENT OPPONENTS across four stages.

Made for Nokia 3310 Jam 4.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement (Including JUMPING)

Z/J - Punch (Hold for FIREBALL ATTACK, can be used to correct jumps)

X/K - Kick

Enter - Start
